name: Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer Demo
name_original: Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer Demo
description:
Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer is an upcoming auto-scrolling action platformer playable right on your very own NES(or your Mapper 30 compatible NES clone console/emulator)!
Play as deft duo Nox Francisca and his girlfriend Veronica Mimeux. Grind your way through the eerie town of St. Crypton and stop your best friend Vlad Drachovi from raising the dead before midnight strikes on All Hallows Eve!
Demo available now!

This game was made with NESmaker:
https://www.thenew8bitheroes.com/
For more info about Woog Worx and our other projects, visit our website:
https://woogworx.com/
We also have a Twitter:
https://twitter.com/WoogWorx
